original_title: Mackinnons Travels’ group tours and tailor-made private travel packages
original_body_lines: Mackinnons Travels Private Limited (MTL) one of Sri Lanka’s leading end-to-end travel management companies and the outbound travel arm of John Keells Holdings PLC (JKH) announced its exceptional range of leisure solutions, with an exciting lineup of upcoming group tours to Azerbaijan, Jordan, Vietnam, Turkey, Europe, Malaysia, and Singapore, and FIT tours to Morocco, the Golden Triangle of India and Kenya.

A press release said: ‘Mackinnons Travels takes pride in its ability to curate extraordinary group experiences that captivate the imagination. These group and FIT tours promise to leave travelers with memories that last a lifetime. CEO Druvi Sirisena expresses his enthusiasm, saying, “Our group tours are meticulously designed to provide an immersive and authentic experience, allowing travelers to explore the world’s most fascinating destinations while forging new friendships. He went on to add, “For those seeking a more personalized travel experience, Mackinnons Travels offers private tours that are tailor-made to suit unique preferences and interests. With Mackinnons Travels, every detail is taken care of to ensure a seamless and unforgettable adventure.”
